name: v1.20.0
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "bazel_features", version = "1.20.0")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your  file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "bazel_features",
    sha256 = "c2596994cf63513bd44180411a4ac3ae95d32bf59148fcb6087a4642b3ffef11",
    strip_prefix = "bazel_features-1.20.0",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel_features/releases/download/v1.20.0/bazel_features-v1.20.0.tar.gz",
)
load("@bazel_features//:deps.bzl", "bazel_features_deps")
bazel_features_deps()
```


## What's Changed
* feat: add feature to indicate availability of runfiles with arbitrary characters by @mark-thm in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel_features/pull/79

## New Contributors
* @mark-thm made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel_features/pull/79

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel_features/compare/v1.19.0...v1.20.0

name: v1.7.1
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:


## Using WORKSPACE



## What's Changed
* Fix issues found by pre-commit hooks by @phst in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel_features/pull/44
* Add cc.undefined_dynamic_lookup feature by @phst in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel_features/pull/43
* Add feature to test whether treat_warnings_as_errors works on macOS by @phst in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel_features/pull/42


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel_features/compare/v1.6.0...v1.7.1

```starlark
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel_features/releases/download/v1.4.1/bazel_features-v1.4.1.tar.gz",
)
load("@bazel_features//:deps.bzl", "bazel_features_deps")
bazel_features_deps()
```


## What's Changed
* fix: BCR presubmit by @cgrindel in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel_features/pull/38


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel_features/compare/v1.4.0...v1.4.1

name: v1.4.0
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "bazel_features", version = "1.4.0")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your  file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "bazel_features",
    sha256 = "4912fc2f5d17199a043e65c108d3f0a2896061296d4c335aee5e6a3a71cc4f0d",
    strip_prefix = "bazel_features-1.4.0",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel_features/releases/download/v1.4.0/bazel_features-v1.4.0.tar.gz",
)
load("@bazel_features//:deps.bzl", "bazel_features_deps")
bazel_features_deps()
```


## What's Changed
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel to v7.0.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel_features/pull/37
* fix: add missing `bzl_library` declarations to satisfy client `stardoc` usage by @cgrindel in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel_features/pull/33

## New Contributors
* @cgrindel made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel_features/pull/33

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel_features/compare/v1.3.0...v1.4.0

name: v0.1.0
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "bazel_features", version = "0.1.0")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your  file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "bazel_features",
    sha256 = "f3082bfcdca73dc77dcd68faace806135a2e08c230b02b1d9fbdbd7db9d9c450",
    strip_prefix = "bazel_features-0.1.0",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel_features/releases/download/v0.1.0/bazel_features-v0.1.0.tar.gz",
)
load("@bazel_features//:deps.bzl", "bazel_features_deps")
bazel_features_deps()
```


## What's Changed
* Make `globals.bzl` private and add docs by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel_features/pull/7
* Configure Renovate by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel_features/pull/9
* Update bazel-contrib/.github action to v3 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel_features/pull/11
* Update dependency bazel to v6.2.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel_features/pull/10
* Update dependency bazel to v6.3.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel_features/pull/13
* Export .bzl files for Stardoc by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel_features/pull/16
* feat: expose a flag name for allow_unresolved_symlinks by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel_features/pull/15

## New Contributors
* @renovate made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel_features/pull/9
* @alexeagle made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel_features/pull/15

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel_features/compare/v0.0.1...v0.1.0

name: v0.0.1
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "bazel_features", version = "0.0.1")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your  file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "bazel_features",
    sha256 = "5836c7e7b23cd20bcaef703838ee320580fe535d0337b981fb2c8367ec2a070b",
    strip_prefix = "bazel_features-0.0.1",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel_features/releases/download/v0.0.1/bazel_features-v0.0.1.tar.gz",
)
load("@bazel_features//:deps.bzl", "bazel_features_deps")
bazel_features_deps()
```


## What's Changed
* initial commit with two basic features by @Wyverald in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel_features/pull/1
* Add `bazel_features.bzlmod.is_enabled` by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel_features/pull/2
* Provide conditional access to globals via `bazel_features.globals` by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel_features/pull/3
* Add find_cpp_toolchain feature by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel_features/pull/6
* Rename `bazel_features.bzlmod` to `bazel_features.external_deps` by @Wyverald in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel_features/pull/4
* CI, release, publish-to-BCR automation by @Wyverald in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel_features/pull/5

## New Contributors
* @Wyverald made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel_features/pull/1
* @fmeum made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel_features/pull/2

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel_features/commits/v0.0.1
